mapper.select: select id, hosp_code, dept_code, code, password, is_in_job, name, age, birthday, gender_code, nation_code, native_place, marry_code, is_pm, in_pm_date, cert_code, cert_no, photo_image, sign_image, introduce, speciality, address, email, phone, education_code, major_code, school, school_date, school_image, work_date, work_type_code, duties_code, prac_certi_no, prac_certi_name, durg_code, antibacterial_code, ph_code, opeartion_code, pswd_err_cnt, last_login_time, last_login_ip, status_code, pym, wbm, crte_id, crte_name, crte_time, signature_path, doctor_intro, is_guide,is_anaesthesia from sys_user where hosp_code = #{hospCode} and id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into sys_user(id, hosp_code, dept_code, code, password, is_in_job, name, age, birthday, gender_code, nation_code, native_place, marry_code, is_pm, in_pm_date, cert_code, cert_no, photo_image, sign_image, introduce, speciality, address, email, phone, education_code, major_code, school, school_date, school_image, work_date, work_type_code, duties_code, prac_certi_no, prac_certi_name, durg_code, antibacterial_code, ph_code, opeartion_code, pswd_err_cnt, last_login_time, last_login_ip, status_code, pym, wbm, crte_id, crte_name, crte_time, signature_path, doctor_intro, is_guide,is_anaesthesia) values (#{id}, #{hospCode}, #{deptCode}, #{code}, #{password}, #{isInJob}, #{name}, #{age}, #{birthday}, #{genderCode}, #{nationCode}, #{nativePlace}, #{marryCode}, #{isPm}, #{inPmDate}, #{certCode}, #{certNo}, #{photoImage}, #{signImage}, #{introduce}, #{speciality}, #{address}, #{email}, #{phone}, #{educationCode}, #{majorCode}, #{school}, #{schoolDate}, #{schoolImage}, #{workDate}, #{workTypeCode}, #{dutiesCode}, #{pracCertiNo}, #{pracCertiName}, #{durgCode}, #{phCode}, #{antibacterialCode}, #{opeartionCode}, #{pswdErrCnt}, #{lastLoginTime}, #{lastLoginIp}, #{statusCode}, #{pym}, #{wbm}, #{crteId}, #{crteName}, #{crteTime}, #{signaturePath}, #{doctorIntro}, '0',#{isAnaesthesia})
mapper.update:
update sys_user
id = #{id},
hosp_code = #{hospCode},
dept_code = #{deptCode},
code = #{code},
password = #{password},
is_in_job = #{isInJob},
name = #{name},
age = #{age},
birthday = #{birthday},
gender_code = #{genderCode},
nation_code = #{nationCode},
native_place = #{nativePlace},
marry_code = #{marryCode},
is_pm = #{isPm},
in_pm_date = #{inPmDate},
cert_code = #{certCode},
cert_no = #{certNo},
photo_image = #{photoImage},
sign_image = #{signImage},
introduce = #{introduce},
speciality = #{speciality},
address = #{address},
email = #{email},
phone = #{phone},
education_code = #{educationCode},
major_code = #{majorCode},
school = #{school},
school_date = #{schoolDate},
school_image = #{schoolImage},
work_date = #{workDate},
work_type_code = #{workTypeCode},
duties_code = #{dutiesCode},
prac_certi_no = #{pracCertiNo},
prac_certi_name = #{pracCertiName},
durg_code = #{durgCode},
antibacterial_code = #{antibacterialCode},
ph_code = #{phCode},
opeartion_code = #{opeartionCode},
pswd_err_cnt = #{pswdErrCnt},
last_login_time = #{lastLoginTime},
last_login_ip = #{lastLoginIp},
status_code = #{statusCode},
pym = #{pym},
wbm = #{wbm},
signature_path = #{signaturePath},
doctor_intro = #{doctorIntro},
is_guide = #{isGuide},
is_anaesthesia = #{isAnaesthesia},
where id= #{id} and hosp_code = #{hospCode}
mapper.insert:
insert into sys_user_system(id, hosp_code, us_code, user_code, system_code, teacher_code, dept_code, crte_id, crte_name, crte_time) values
(#{item.id}, #{item.hospCode}, #{item.usCode}, #{item.userCode}, #{item.systemCode}, #{item.teacherCode}, #{item.deptCode}, #{item.crteId}, #{item.crteName}, #{item.crteTime})
mapper.update: update sys_user set password = #{password} where id= #{id} and hosp_code = #{hospCode}
update sys_user set pswd_err_cnt = 0,status_code = '0' where id=#{id} and hosp_code = #{hospCode}
mapper.delete: delete from sys_user_system where hosp_code = #{hospCode} and user_code = #{code}
mapper.select: select count(id) from sys_user where hosp_code = #{hospCode} and cert_code = '01' and cert_no = #{certNo} and id != #{id}

select a.id, a.hosp_code, a.dept_code, a.code, a.password, a.is_in_job, a.name, a.age, a.birthday, a.gender_code, a.nation_code, a.native_place, a.marry_code, a.is_pm, a.in_pm_date, a.cert_code, a.cert_no, a.photo_image, a.sign_image, a.introduce, a.speciality, a.address, a.email, a.phone, a.education_code, a.major_code, a.school, a.school_date, a.school_image, a.work_date, a.work_type_code, a.duties_code, a.prac_certi_no, a.prac_certi_name, a.durg_code, a.antibacterial_code, a.ph_code, a.opeartion_code, a.pswd_err_cnt, a.last_login_time, a.last_login_ip, a.status_code, a.pym, a.wbm, a.crte_id,a.crte_name, a.crte_time,a.signature_path, a.doctor_intro, a.is_guide from sys_user a where a.hosp_code = #{hospCode} and a.code = #{userCode}

select id, hosp_code, dept_code, code, password, is_in_job, name, age, birthday, gender_code, nation_code, native_place, marry_code, is_pm, in_pm_date, cert_code, cert_no, photo_image, sign_image, introduce, speciality, address, email, phone, education_code, major_code, school, school_date, school_image, work_date, work_type_code, duties_code, prac_certi_no, durg_code, antibacterial_code, ph_code, opeartion_code, pswd_err_cnt, last_login_time, last_login_ip, status_code, pym, wbm, crte_id, crte_name, crte_time, signature_path, doctor_intro,is_guide,is_anaesthesia from sys_user where sys_user.hosp_code = #{hospCode}
and
sys_user.work_type_code like concat(#{item},'%')
and sys_user.code in (select user_code from sys_user_system where sys_user_system.dept_code = #{deptCode} and sys_user_system.hosp_code = #{hospCode} group by user_code )
mapper.insert:
insert into sys_user_role (id, hosp_code, us_code, role_code, crte_id, crte_name, crte_time) values
(#{item.id},#{item.hospCode}, #{item.usCode}, #{item.roleCode}, #{item.crteId}, #{item.crteName}, #{item.crteTime})

insert into sys_user(id, hosp_code, dept_code, code, password, is_in_job, name, age, birthday, gender_code, nation_code, native_place, marry_code, is_pm, in_pm_date, cert_code, cert_no, photo_image, sign_image, introduce, speciality, address, email, phone, education_code, major_code, school, school_date, school_image, work_date, work_type_code, duties_code, prac_certi_no, prac_certi_name, durg_code, antibacterial_code, ph_code, opeartion_code, pswd_err_cnt, last_login_time, last_login_ip, status_code, pym, wbm, crte_id, crte_name, crte_time,signature_path, doctor_intro, is_guide) values
(#{item.id}, #{item.hospCode}, #{item.deptCode}, #{item.code}, #{item.password}, #{item.isInJob}, #{item.name}, #{item.age}, #{item.birthday}, #{item.genderCode}, #{item.nationCode}, #{item.nativePlace}, #{item.marryCode}, #{item.isPm}, #{item.inPmDate}, #{item.certCode}, #{item.certNo}, #{item.photoImage}, #{item.signImage}, #{item.introduce}, #{item.speciality}, #{item.address}, #{item.email}, #{item.phone}, #{item.educationCode}, #{item.majorCode}, #{item.school}, #{item.schoolDate}, #{item.schoolImage}, #{item.workDate}, #{item.workTypeCode}, #{item.dutiesCode}, #{item.pracCertiNo}, #{item.pracCertiName}, #{item.durgCode}, #{item.phCode}, #{item.antibacterialCode}, #{item.opeartionCode}, '0', #{item.lastLoginTime}, #{item.lastLoginIp}, #{item.statusCode}, #{item.pym}, #{item.wbm}, #{item.crteId}, #{item.crteName}, #{item.crteTime}, #{item.signaturePath}, #{item.doctorIntro}, '0')
mapper.select: select c.* from sys_user a join sys_user_system b on a.code=b.user_code JOIN sys_user c on b.teacher_code = c.CODE where a.id=#{id} and a.hosp_code=#{hospCode} and b.hosp_code=#{hospCode} and c.hosp_code=#{hospCode}

select us_code from sys_user_system where (hosp_code,user_code,system_code,dept_code) in
(#{item.hospCode},#{item.userCode},#{item.systemCode},#{item.deptCode})
